body: Okay guys since Halloween is coming/here I decided to make a costume for my avi,  my avi is going as Dare Devil this year, and I want to see you guys make Halloween costumes for your avatars and show them off! Good luck and have fun!
body_tagged: Okay guys since Halloween is coming/here I decided to make a costume for my avi,  my avi is going as Dare Devil this year, and I want to see you guys make Halloween costumes for your avatars and show them off! Good luck and have fun!
